name: Server Management Commands
desc: These commands are used to maintain the Discord server.

commands.name: .chdel [channel-name]
commands.desc: This command will delete the channel the command is executed in or it will delete the specified channel.

commands.name: .role [user] [role]
commands.desc: Gives the specified user the specified role.

commands.name: .removerole [user] [role]
commands.desc: Removes the specified role from the specified user.

commands.name: .massrole [role] [remove] [show-messages]
commands.desc: Mass assigns the specified role to all users. The last two options are optional. If you set the second option to 'true', it will remove the specified role from all users. If you set the third option to 'true', Charmy will log all the responses to the channel the command is executed in.

commands.name: .tx [name]
commands.desc: This command created a text channel with the specified name.

commands.name: .vc [name]
commands.desc: This command created a voice channel with the specified name.
